ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: TheCode, I m interested in knowing how Suukie mysteriously repaired himself. And how that matter, with the amount of mech-fluid he was leaking, even made it

Received: (qmail 30314 invoked from network); 26 May 2000 22:21:44 -0000
Received: from unknown (10.1.10.27) by m3.onelist.org with QMQP; 26 May 2000 22:21:43 -0000
Received: from unknown (HELO csimo01.mx.cs.com) (152.163.225.74) by mta2 with SMTP; 26 May 2000 22:21:43 -0000
Received: from KSLawdogg@... by csimo01.mx.aol.com (mail_out_v26.7.) id a.38.6781dbe (4380) for <nbwrpg@egroups.com>; Fri, 26 May 2000 18:21:37 -0400 (EDT)
Message-ID: <38.6781dbe.266052f1@...>
Date: Fri, 26 May 2000 18:21:37 EDT
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 101
From: KSLawdogg@...

TheCode, I'm interested in knowing how Suukie mysteriously repaired himself.  
And how that matter, with the amount of mech-fluid he was leaking, even made 
it out of the Ark?  And, if it was by getting to Plintissa's "CR Chamber", 
I'd have to say...please stop moding already.  Gosh, you make me wanna kick 
the crap out of someone.  A CR takes energy.  A base takes energy.  How does 
Plintissa even know how to build one?  I'm sure it's a complicated process.   
Where the Hell did she get the Cybertronian components from on Past Earth, 
where the wheel hasn't even been invented.  How did she get all the scrap 
metal?  Where is she getting the energy to power the CR Chamber?  Think 
before you post, god.  And another thing, you never posted for the charge 
Ramhorn tossed into the bridge set to explode in five seconds.  Did Suukie, 
with all his wounds, mystically get out of the bridge via teleportation?  I'm 
really ticked, and now you're bringing in the rock?  I have to agree with 
Talon, that is a dumb idea.  That ruins the entire thing.  I'm willing to 
take this up with Yanshosh/Zardus (and the Council), but you are driving my 
patience, and I'm you're doing the same to a lot of other people, with your 
whole "destroy the Ark's defenses, steal the Autobot/Decepticon bodies, go 
into an underground base which you made lickety split in a few seconds".  
That is moding.  You even admitted to moding, on purpose, so no one could 
ruin it.  That's part of the RPG, TheCode, everyone participates.



Stinkbomb/Ramhorn:
